prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with flowing blue hair and a graceful tail.
I want a fairy-type creature that sparkles and has a vibrant, colorful appearance.
Generate an elegant Pokemon that resembles a mermaid with enchanting features.
Make a whimsical Pokemon with a bubbly personality and a majestic presence.
Imagine a Pokemon that dances gracefully on the waves, adorned in colorful motifs.
Design a Pokemon that showcases beauty and charm, with a serene and calming aura.
Give me a cute yet powerful creature that can control the ocean's currents.
